lines: Anka manya gyidė a enhim
B'rč a tamfo hyɛ me so.
Nea ɛrenwosow da Ohia biara anim,
Ohia ne yaw anim, Ohia ne yaw anim.
Sɛ mpire gu me so mpo a
Ͻrensi apini, Na 'w'rɛhow ne ɔyaw
Bere biara mu no, Ͻtwere ne Nyame;
Ͻtwere ne Nyame.
Gyidi a ɛhyerɛn kɛse
B're a ahum tu mpo Nea mmusu bere mu,
Ennim suro biara, Ennim 'kyinnye sum mu,
Ennim 'kyinnye sum mu.
Nea wiase 'bufuw ntum' mpusuw,
Na entie ne fɛwdi; Nea bɔn' po rentumi
Nyiri nkata so da, Hwee ntumi nnaadaa no;
Hwee ntumi nnaadaa no.
'W'ra ma me saa gyidi yi bi,
Na nea 'besi biara Mɛka s'ro dɛ kronkron
No bi ahwɛ fam ha; Daapem fie hɔ no,
Daapem fie hɔ de no.
